SEARCH
Package admin

Class Admin

java.lang.Object
system.User
admin.Admin
public class Admin extends User
  • Administrator class that extends from User Class
  • A specialization of a type of user
  • Administrator class is given highest access and methods to fully edit and change the states and attributes of Staff,customer order and branch under the Administrator
  • Administrator also has unique functionalities like transfering, promoting managers and removing a payment option for a branch
    • Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    FDAB 2

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type
      Method
      Description
      void
      addRemoveBranch(Scanner sc, Database database)
      This method allows administrator to add or remove a branch This is different from opening and removing a branch Removing a branch will purge all data and information related to that branch from CSV Database
      void
      addRemovePayment(Scanner sc)
      The method gives administrator the ability to remove and/or add a new or existing payment option This method effectively affects the payment class's availability itself, meaning if one payment type is added/removed, all branches will gain/lose this payment type
      void
      changePassword(Scanner sc)
      Methods sets up the changing of password for security measures, will validate and stop program if number of trials exit 3 attempts
      void
      chooseFilter(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
      Method for Administrator to be able to view all staff by specific filters
      boolean
      displayStaffAccounts(ArrayList<User> accounts)
      Method that prints out all staff and managers under the Administrator along with their information like age,gender,etc.
      void
      manageAccounts(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
      Method is an UI for the facilitation of adding,editing and removing Accounts under the Administrator
      void
      openCloseBranch(Scanner sc, Database database)
      Method allows administrator to be able to open a new branch or close an existing branch By closing a branch, it means that the operation status of the branch is switched from open to close.
      void
      promoteStaff(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
      Method allows Administrator to promote a staff into a manager for a branch Method will convert the type of the staff object into a manager object , while keeping the same object under the same branch The method will reject operation if the quota of the branch is at limit capacity or if the staff is already promoted to manager
      void
      transferStaff(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
      Method allows Administrator to be able to transfer staff to another branch The method will reject the transfer if target branch is already at max capacity

    • Constructor Details

      • Admin

        public Admin(String adminId, String password, String name, User.Gender gender, int age, String branchName)
        Constructor for Admin class
        Parameters:
        adminId - ID identifying the administrator
        password - Password of Administrator
        name - Name of Administrator
        gender - Gender of Administrator
        age - age of Administrator
        branchName - Name of Branch that Administrator is employed in

    • Method Details

      • displayStaffAccounts

        public boolean displayStaffAccounts(ArrayList<User> accounts)
        Method that prints out all staff and managers under the Administrator along with their information like age,gender,etc.
        Parameters:
        accounts - List of all user accounts managed by Administrator
        Returns:
      • False if no accounts are found
      • True if at least one staff exist and information is printed

      • chooseFilter

        public void chooseFilter(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
      • Method for Administrator to be able to view all staff by specific filters
        • Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object
        accounts - all accounts under Administrator
        database - Database where information of these accounts are being read and retrieve from

      • manageAccounts

        public void manageAccounts(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
        Method is an UI for the facilitation of adding,editing and removing Accounts under the Administrator
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object
        accounts - all accounts under the Administrator
        database - Database where information of these accounts are being read and retrieve from

      • promoteStaff

        public void promoteStaff(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
      • Method allows Administrator to promote a staff into a manager for a branch
      • Method will convert the type of the staff object into a manager object , while keeping the same object under the same branch
      • The method will reject operation if the quota of the branch is at limit capacity or if the staff is already promoted to manager
        • Parameters:
        sc - scanner object
        accounts - all accounts under the Administrator
        database - Database where information of these accounts are being read and retrieve from

      • transferStaff

        public void transferStaff(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> accounts, Database database)
      • Method allows Administrator to be able to transfer staff to another branch
      • The method will reject the transfer if target branch is already at max capacity
        • Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object
        accounts - all accounts under the Administrator
        database - Database where information of these accounts are being read and retrieve from

      • addRemovePayment

        public void addRemovePayment(Scanner sc)
      • The method gives administrator the ability to remove and/or add a new or existing payment option
      • This method effectively affects the payment class's availability itself, meaning if one payment type is added/removed, all branches will gain/lose this payment type
        • Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object

      • openCloseBranch

        public void openCloseBranch(Scanner sc, Database database)
      • Method allows administrator to be able to open a new branch or close an existing branch
      • By closing a branch, it means that the operation status of the branch is switched from open to close. Staff ,food item and other information are still retained.
        • Parameters:
        sc - Scanner object
        database - Database where information of these accounts are being read and retrieve from

      • addRemoveBranch

        public void addRemoveBranch(Scanner sc, Database database)
      • This method allows administrator to add or remove a branch
      • This is different from opening and removing a branch
      • Removing a branch will purge all data and information related to that branch from CSV Database
        • Parameters:
        sc - Scanner Object
        database - Database where information of these accounts are being read and retrieve from

      • changePassword

        public void changePassword(Scanner sc)
        Methods sets up the changing of password for security measures, will validate and stop program if number of trials exit 3 attempts
        Parameters:
        sc - scanner object
